## SAJE 

### PND

```{r, include=FALSE}
saje_pnd <- scdf(c(77.27, 74.29, 77.50, 75.96, 81.35, 79.51),
                 phase.design = c(A = 3, B = 3))
```

```{r, include=TRUE}
pnd(saje_pnd, decreasing = FALSE)
```

### Tau-U

#### Parker (2011) Version

```{r, include=TRUE}
saje_1 <- scdf(c(77.27, 74.29, 77.50, 75.96, 81.35, 79.51),
                 phase.design = c(A = 3, B = 3))

saje_res <- tau_u(saje_1)

print(saje_res, complete = TRUE)
```


#### Tarlow (2016) Version

This calculation is based on Kendalls Tau

```{r, include=TRUE}
saje_2 <- scdf(c(A = 77.27, 74.29, 77.50, B = 75.96, 81.35, 79.51))

corrected_tau(saje_2)
```



## LELI

### PND

```{r, include=FALSE}
leli_pnd <- scdf(c(57.58, 61.11, 56.41, 51.85, 54.17, 60, 70.79, 72),
                 phase.design = c(A = 5, B = 3))
```

```{r, include=TRUE}
pnd(leli_pnd, decreasing = FALSE)
```

### Tau-U

#### Parker (2011) Version

```{r, include=TRUE}
leli_1 <- scdf(c(57.58, 61.11, 56.41, 51.85, 54.17, 60, 70.79, 72),
                 phase.design = c(A = 5, B = 3))

leli_res <- tau_u(leli_1)

print(leli_res, complete = TRUE)
```

#### Tarlow (2016) Version

This calculation is based on Kendalls Tau

```{r, include=TRUE}
leli_2 <- scdf(c(A = 57.58, 61.11, 56.41, 51.85, 54.17, B = 60, 70.79, 72))

corrected_tau(leli_2)
```
